name: best
description: The view page for all of the magazines includes the following features:   ### Header:     - A search bar for searching     - About Us tag directs to info about the group     - Submission tag directs to a Subission page   ### Body:     - Search Results:       - A picture of the magazine cover embedded in the brief magazine box       - Clicking on the magazine cover directs to `magazine_viewing.html` containing the entire magazine content with a flipping function for the PDF       - The color of the magazine cover lights up when the mouse floats over it ## About Us Page:   ### Header:     - Recturn tag that returns you back to the View Page     - Submission tag directs to a Subission page   ### Body:
